content: प्रवचनं {@--1@} Speaking, declaration, announcement; <ls>Pt. 1. 190.</ls> {@--2@} Teaching, expounding. {@--3@} Exposition, explanation, interpretation; <ls>Mv. 4. 25.</ls> {@--4@} Eloquence. {@--5@} A sacred treatise or writing; <ls>Ms. 3. 184.</ls> {@--6@} An expression, a term. {@--7@} A system of doctrines (in the form of a treatise). {@--8@} The fundamental doctrine of the Buddhists.
